mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.goods_order_uuid_number as goodsOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.goods_id as goodsId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.goods_order_true_price as goodsOrderTruePrice ,a.goods_order_types as goodsOrderTypes ,a.goods_order_payment_types as goodsOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
